name: Four Points by Sheraton Miami Airport
description: Your stay at Four Points by Sheraton Miami Airport begins virtually the moment your plane touches the ground, thanks to our complimentary shuttle service. Surrounded by many of the city's most prominent shopping destinations, our hotel offers unparalleled access to the Dolphin Mall, CityPlace Doral and the Miami International Mall. When you need a moment to yourself, withdraw into the modern comfort of our spacious accommodations, complete with complimentary Wi-Fi, plush bedding and flat-panel TVs. Whether you want to take a dip in our outdoor pool or lift weights in our 24-hour fitness center, featuring free weights and cardio equipment, you'll never have to let a workout pass you by. Once you've worked up an appetite, head over to our on-site restaurant and bar for an extensive selection of delectable dishes and handcrafted cocktails. Whatever the reason for your travels, allow Four Points by Sheraton Miami Airport to provide the friendly service and thoughtful amenities you deserve.Marriott

name: Fortune House Hotel Suites
description: On Brickell Avenue, and less than 3 miles from the Port of Miami, this apartment-style Florida hotel provides an outdoor pool, hot tub, and on-site restaurant. The spacious, fully-furnished suites at Fortune House Hotel feature a full kitchen, private laundromat, and a balcony. Separate bedrooms and a dining areas are also included. A state-of-the-art fitness center and sauna are available to all guests at the Hotel Fortune House. Guests will have access to free property-wide Wi-Fi and a 24-hour front desk for added convenience. Madison's Restaurant and Lounge serves unique fusion of contemporary and traditional Latin fare. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are made-to-order from the menu. Fortune House is less than 2 miles from American Airlines Arena and a 15-minute drive from Miami Beach. Miami International Airport is less than 10 miles away.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Miami International Airport
address: 3974 Northwest South River Drive, Miami, FL 33142
description: Welcome to Embassy Suites Hotel - Miami International Airport, a proud member of the Florida GREEN Lodging Program. Our Miami Florida airport hotel offers great year round weather and fantastic Summer Family Vacation Packages and Specials. Our Miami airport hotel is conveniently located just a half mile from MIA and we offer complimentary drop-off and pick-up airport shuttle service. Miami has a diverse and rich culture and our hotel is proud to be a part of it. All major Miami attractions are close by our hotel including the Miami Seaquarium, Jungle Island, historic Coral Gables, Miami's trendy South Beach and of course, the Port of Miami for all your cruise departures. Individual Transfers to the Port of Miami are also available for a Nominal Fee. Reserve your seats upon check-in at our Front Desk! Many of our Miami airport hotel guests experience the following attractions during their stay with us: The Port of Miami for all CRUISE departures! Fantastic Miami Shopping Malls, Outdoor Markets and upscale street venues, The best Golf in Florida at Miami Golf Courses, Miami Spa Services In-Suite, Miami Sports Arena's including homes of the Dolphins, Heat and Marlins! The hip sophistication and international flair of South Beach, Miami Museums, the Miami Zoo and Florida National Parks. Our Miami airport hotel has something to offer travelers from around the world. Miami Florida is an international gateway for businesses, health industries, world commerce and has also become a leading destination for the entertainment industry. South Beach is known around the world as a beacon for international musicians, artists and dance companies. South Beach and downtown Miami are home to some of the top clubs, discothèques and art galleries in the world. Below is a list of just some of the major corporations that have made Miami their home base: Lennar Corporation, The University of Miami, Carnival Cruise Lines Corporation, Burger King Corporation, World Fuel Services, Southern Wine & Spirits Corporation. As we mentioned above, you can't beat the weather in Miami. Our average temperature is 75.9 C and although it gets warmer in the summer months, Miami is a lush, tropical paradise at the southern tip of the Florida peninsula with Key Biscayne just a short drive away and Key West just a three hour drive from our hotel. When you need it bad, we've got it good! Welcome to Miami!Hilton

name: Sentral Wynwood
description: Sentral Wynwood has been featured in Forbes, NYTimes & Conde Nast, and has hosted over 200k guests in 1,000+ spaces with an average rating of 4.8 stars.As the newest hotel addition, Sentral Wynwood boasts a range of trendy rooms—from artsy studios to unique two bedroom suites with full kitchens and living rooms.Enjoy the lively atmosphere of our rooftop pool or break a sweat in our fitness center.Sentral Wynwood is the perfect place for large groups of families and friends to enjoy curated apartment-style living with hotel amenities.Guests are a block away from Wynwood Walls and minutes away to several art galleries.This unit features:688 square feet (average) Bedroom: Queen bedDen: Queen bedLiving Room: Sofa bedThe Space:**As this is a brand-new property, renderings are provided to show a sample of the building and unit plans.Final furniture and in-unit finishes may vary,but will be of similar quality and aesthetic to the images shown.**-En-suite laundry-Fully equipped kitchen -Towels & linen provided-Complimentary bathroom essentials-High-speed internet-Designer furniture -Original artworkGuest Access:Sentral Wynwood is equipped with a clubroom, a 24hour concierge, and our fitness center, making it easy to stay active even while you're away from home. Take a dip and relax at our rooftop pool fit with lounge chairs and a stunning view.Interaction with Guests:We’re there when you need us, gone when you don't. Our experienced staff is always ready to make your stay with us as delightful as possible.The Neighborhood:Wynwood is an outdoor art exhibit at city scale, unrivaled in its blend of well-known names and up-and-coming artists. Home to the famous Wynwood Wall, over 200 distinct street murals vibrantly revives former factories and warehouses. There is also plenty to see, eat, drink, and explore with over 200 local bars and restaurants. Nearby parks include Roberto Clemente Park, Rainbow Village Park and Robert E Lee Park.Getting Around:Sentral Wynwood is rated as a Walker's Paradise (96) on Walkscore making daily errands a breeze by foot. Parking is also available at the property's garage for an additional fee of $25 per night (max of one car per stay) and based on availability. Ride hailing services like Uber and Lyft are also readily accessible. Average Travel Times (by car):Miami International Airport: 20mins Downtown Miami: 10-15mins Miami Beach: 20-25mins Hard Rock Stadium: 30-40mins Other Things to Note:**Disclaimer: Construction is expected to be completed Jan 2020. We will do our best to minimize the construction's impact during your stay and are readily available should there be any questions and or concerns. As this is a brand-new property, renderings are provided to show a sample of the building and unit plans. Final furniture and in-unit finishes may vary, but will be of similar quality and aesthetic to the images shown.**Check-in Age:Guests must be at least 21 years of age to check in. Pool Hours: Daily 7AM - 10PMSmoking Fee:100% non-smoking hotel. A fee of up to $500 USD will be assessed for smoking in the hotel, including the rooftop and terraces.Please ask the Front Desk for locations of designated outdoor smoking areas.Limited Housekeeping Service:At Sentral, we're committed to sustainability and an eco-friendly service offering. Our team maintains a high standard of cleaning and will always clean your apartment before check-in and after check-out.Additional cleanings are at request/based on availability and mayExpedia

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Grand Hotel Biscayne Bay
description: The Doubletree Grand Hotel Biscayne Bay is a waterfront luxury full-service condo-hotel in the heart of downtown Miami, Florida and eight miles from Key Biscayne. Our hotel is located within a four-minute walk of the Miami Passport Agency and just one mile away from PortMiami which encompasses some of the most popular cruise ships, including Royal Caribbean, Carnival, and Norwegian Cruise Lines. We are also a favorite Miami hotel for pre-cruise stays out of the PortMiami with our Miami Hotel/Cruise Package. The hotel backyard is the Sea Isle Marina, home to the Miami International Boat Show in February, where guests can enjoy scenic charters of Miami on the Biscayne Lady, Island Queen Cruises, and Pier 5 Fishing. Our hotel is within walking distance of the new Adrienne Arsht Center for the Performing Arts of Miami Dade County (featuring the Ziff Opera House and Knight Concert Hall) and is also less than two miles from Miami Brickell Avenue financial district, the fun, food and shops of Bayside Marketplace, Miami Dade Arena, and Miami Beach. World-famous South Beach and the Art Deco Historic District are a short jump over scenic causeways, and Miami International Airport is only 15 minutes away. Our full-service hotel in Biscayne Bay provides value in a tropical oasis of waterfront elegance for south Florida vacations, extended stays, or business travel. Miami Dades Metromover station is very close to our hotel, providing quick, complimentary transportation around the city of Miami, FL. With easy access to I-95 and A1A, all of glorious south Florida - from Key West to Palm Beach - lies within easy reach. Our hotel Features over 6,500 square feet of meeting space, with a Grand Ballroom and terrace overlooking beautiful Biscayne Bay, complimentary wireless Internet in public areas, Olympic size outdoor heated pool, state-of-the-art fitness center - Joe Lupos Fitness Center, tennis courts, Primos Kitchen Bar, Los Gauchitos Argentinean Steakhouse, La Fabourg Deli serving freshly brewed Starbucks coffee daily, Biscayne Lady and Miami Yacht Charters, Concierge Desk, Beauty Salon - Barbra Hair Salon and Spa. Hotel Accommodations: Beautifully adorned guestrooms and suites featuring many rooms with bay/park or garden views, 56 one and two-bedroom fully equipped condo units, Sweet Dreams bedding with pillow top mattresses, down-filled duvets and pillows to please, internet access, marble baths, executive desk with data port and leather swivel chair, coffee maker and complimentary coffee and tea.Hilton

name: Hotel Ponce de Leon
address: 1721 Ponce De Leon Boulevard, Miami, FL 33134
description: Located in Miami, Hotel Ponce de Leon is 2625 feet from Miracle Mile Miami. Built in 1923, the property is within 3.1 mi of Cocowalk Shopping Center and Marlins Park. The accommodations provides a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space for guests. All rooms are accessible by stairs and come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, microwave, a coffee machine, a bath or shower and a desk. All units at the hotel include air conditioning and a wardrobe. Vizcaya Museum is 3.1 mi from Hotel Ponce de Leon, while Bayside Market Place is 5 mi away. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 3.1 mi from the property.

name: Hyatt Place Miami Airport East
address: 3549 Northwest Le Jeune Road, Miami, FL 33142
description: Located 11 minutes' drive from The Shops of Midtown Miami, Hyatt Place Miami Airport East offers accommodations in Miami. The hotel has an outdoor pool and terrace. Guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant. Every room is equipped with a 42-inch flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Additional amenities include a private bathroom with granite counter-tops and a sofa or sofa bed. This Miami Airport East Hyatt Place offers meeting and event space as well as an on-site fitness center. The 24/7 gallery serves American dishes, including a cheddar burgers, spinach salad, and turkey sandwiches. Marlins Park is 3.7 mi from Hyatt Place Miami Airport East, while Miracle Mile Miami is 3.7 mi from the property. The nearest airport is Miami Airport, 1.2 mi from Hyatt Place Miami Airport East.

name: Staybridge Suites Miami International Airport
description: Staybridge Suites - Miami International Airport features air-conditioned rooms in Miami. With an outdoor swimming pool, the property also has a fitness center, as well as barbecue facilities. Miami International Airport is 1.2 mi from the property, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service. A continental breakfast is available daily at the hotel. All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a bath or shower and a hair dryer. All rooms feature a desk. An onsite bar and juice bar are provided for guests to enjoy. An evening reception with complimentary light fare, beer, and wine is offered Monday through Wednesday. Guests will find a 24-hour front desk, a business center and laundry service at the property. Complimentary shuttle service is offered to the Miami Intermodal Center, which is 1476 ft away. The property is 2.7 mi from Marlins Park and 3.7 mi from Miracle Mile Miami.

name: Costa Norte Boutique Hotel
description: Located in Miami Beach and within a 4-minute walk of Miami Beach, Costa Norte Boutique Hotel has a terrace, allergy-free rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. This 3-star hotel offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. Surfside Beach is 1.2 miles from the hotel and New World Center is 4.9 miles away. The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. Rooms have a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Costa Norte Boutique Hotel each room has bed linen and towels. Holocaust Memorial is 4.9 miles from the accommodation, while Miami Beach Convention Center is 4.9 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 12 miles from Costa Norte Boutique Hotel.

name: SERENA Hotel Aventura Miami, Tapestry Collection by Hilton
description: The SERENA Hotel Aventura is moments away from world class shopping at Aventura Mall and neighbors to Gulf Stream Park and Casino, where you can enjoy live horse races, fine restaurants, gambling and shopping. We are located in the epicenter of the Aventura Medical District and the nearest hotel to the Aventura Hospital. Enjoy refined contemporary rooms and suites in a relaxed atmosphere. A portion of our suites feature separate living and sleeping areas featuring including a fully equipped kitchen. We offer a full restaurant and bar, a conference room, fitness center and rooftop swimming pool. SERENA is derived from the Latin word serenus, meaning clear, tranquil, or serene. Whether you’ve spent your day under the sun, shopping or working you can unplug and arrive at your place of tranquility.Hilton

name: Hotel Colonnade Coral Gables, Autograph Collection
description: Surround yourself with world class shopping, decadent dining and electrifying entertainment venues at Hotel Colonnade Coral Gables, Autograph Collection. Our luxury hotel flaunts an ideal location along Miracle Mile near the area's most popular destinations including University of Miami, Watsco Center, Marlins Park as well as Little Havana. Boasting vaulted ceilings, a grand staircase and sparkling chandeliers, our spectacular hotel lobby sets the scene for our stylishly designed accommodations. Unpack in spacious rooms and suites with wood floors, sectional sofas, modern decor and deluxe amenities before relaxing on a canopy bed with plush, pillow-top mattresses and luxurious linens. In your free time, maintain your wellness routine at our hotel's fitness center, play a round of billiards in our game room or soak up the sunshine next to our gorgeous rooftop pool. From our boutique accommodations to intuitive amenities, Hotel Colonnade Coral Gables, Autograph Collection will entice your sense of enjoyment.Marriott

name: Berkeley Shore Hotel
description: The Berkeley offers 96 rooms, gorgeous views, a rooftop pool and many other upscale enhancements. Were also committed to a mission of sustainability and have removed all plastics from our hotel as part of Iberostars Wave of Change initiative.Youll fall in love with the classic Art Deco faade and modern interiors of our South Beach hotel. Experience world-class amenities, impeccable service and spectacular views.iHotelier/iStay

name: Private Oasis at Arya
description: Located in Miami in the Florida region, with Cocowalk Shopping Center nearby, Private Oasis at Arya provides accommodations with free Wifi and free private parking, as well as access to a sauna. Some of the units include satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. The apartment offers a range of wellness facilities including a hot tub and a fitness room. A an indoor play area is also available at Private Oasis at Arya, while guests can also relax on the sun terrace. Vizcaya Museum is 2.8 miles from the accommodation, while University of Miami is 3.5 miles away. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 6.2 miles from Private Oasis at Arya.

name: DoubleTree Resort & Spa by Hilton Ocean Point-N. Miami Beach
address: 17375 Collins Avenue, North Miami Beach, FL 33160
description: Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: guest internet access: two beach chairs: two beach towels: 25% discount on food in restaurant outlets: two bottles of water: 15% salon discount: local and toll-free calls. The Doubletree Ocean Point Resort & Spa - Miami Beach North is a full service, beachfront resort hotel and spa situated between the Bal Harbour and Aventura areas of the northern section of Miami Beach. Ideally located in sunny south Florida, the Ocean Point Resort hotel is less than 30 minutes from either Miami International Airport (MIA) or Fort Lauderdale / Hollywood International Airport (FLL). This exquisite resort hotel features spacious guestrooms and one- or two-bedroom apartment-style suites with fully equipped kitchens. Our luxurious accommodations include refrigerator, wet bar, microwave, washer and dryer, high-speed internet access (wired and wireless), and panoramic ocean views from all guest rooms. Most rooms and suites have a balcony. At the Ocean Point Resort, we believe in pampering. Indulge yourself with full-service European-style spa and beauty salon treatments. Have a massage in one of our hotel oceanside cabanas - you're worth it. We recommend that you call 786-528-2900 in advance of your arrival for Spa reservations and treatment details. Dine overlooking the Atlantic Ocean in The View restaurant, serving Continental cuisine and fresh seafood with a Miami flair. Or, try The Market Coffee Shop & Deli for lighter fare in casual surroundings just steps from the pool and beach. For special events or social occasions, our versatile meeting rooms and outdoor terraces can accommodate up to 300 guests. Allow our talented professionals to create your dream wedding reception in the most spectacular atmosphere. Go snorkeling or sport fishing. Relax under a beach umbrella. Explore the exclusive Bal Harbour Shops or Aventura Mall. Enjoy sightseeing and gallery-browsing along Miami Beach's historic Art Deco District. Take the family to Miami Seaquarium or Parrot Jungle. There is so much to see and do in the Miami area - or opt to do nothing at all. Our attentive, caring hotel staff looks forward to welcoming you to the Doubletree Ocean Point Resort & Spa with our special, signature warm chocolate-chip cookie at check-in.Hilton

name: Comfort Inn and Suites Miami International Airport
description: Enjoy cozy accommodations, professional service, and our famous waffles with breakfast each morning at our Comfort Inn and Suites Miami International Airport hotel in Miami Springs, FL. Amenities include free WiFi, free hot breakfast, meeting space, business center, fitness center, outdoor pool and sundeck. Guest rooms feature flat screen TV, pillowtop mattress, desk, microwave, refrigerator and more. Our hotel is close to Miami International Airport, the Airbus Training Center, and many dining and shopping options. We are just 10 minutes to the beach and easy access to popular local attractions like Hiaaleah Park, downtown Miami, Port of Miami, Doral Country Club and Bayside Marketplace. Complete your plans for a Miami getaway by booking a room at our hotel in Miami Springs, FL. You can also earn rewards, including free nights and gift cards, with our Choice Privileges Rewards program. No Pets Allowed.Choice Hotels

name: Newport Beachside Hotel & Resort
address: 16701 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: No description found

name: Praia Hotel Hollywood
description: Well set in the center of Hollywood, PRAIA Hotel Hollywood provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and free private parking. Featuring a garden, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 21 mi from Miami Beach and around 0.7 mi from Surfside Beach. The hotel features family rooms. All units at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. All guest rooms include a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. Bal Harbor Beach is 1.8 mi from PRAIA Hotel Hollywood, while New World Center is 5.4 mi away. The nearest airport is Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport, 7.5 mi from the accommodations.

name: Four Seasons Hotel At The Surf Club
description: This 1930s-era Four Seasons Hotel at The Surf Club is in the northern Miami Beaches on Collins Avenue 5.7 mi from South Beach and 13 mi from Downtown Miami. Features include on-site restaurant, beach, and pool area. Oceanfront dining is possible at the Amalfi Coast-inspired Le Sirenuse Miami and Champagne Bar & Lounge, which is a sister restaurant to the Michelin-starred Le Sirenuse's La Sponda in Positano, Italy. The property features architecture by Pritzker-prize winning architect, Richard Meier, and interior designer Joseph Dirandan. A holistic spa, fitness center, and kid's club are offered. The front desk is open 24 hours. Custom furnishings, a flat-screen TV, and floor-to-ceiling windows in addition to a marble bathroom are standard in every Four Seasons Hotel at The Surf Club room. Some rooms have a balcony with an ocean or city view, and 5 unique Cabana Studios are offered as well. Bal Harbor Shops is 16 minutes' walk away, while the Miami Beach Convention Center is 5.6 mi from Four Seasons Hotel at The Surf Club. Lincoln Road is 6.2 mi from the property, and Miami International Airport is 15 mi away.

name: Sea View Hotel
description: This European-style hotel is on a beautiful Atlantic Coast beach in Bal Harbour Village, experience contemporary luxury in an ideal setting for a soothing and memorable vacation. Sea View features a fitness center, beauty salon, and pool lounge chairs for a fee. A business center with high-speed internet and photocopying facilities is available as well. The Terrace Room features American cuisine for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. The Pool Bar serves a variety of beverages including beer and specialty cocktails. The Emerald Lounge has evenings of light fare, wine, and seasonal entertainment. Spend the day on the private beach just steps away for swimming, relaxing or parasailing. Enjoy the walking/jogging path with a physical fitness course conveniently on-site. The Sea View has everything necessary for every guest's enjoyment and relaxation.

name: 1818 Meridian House
description: Guests at this apartment-style Miami Beach property can stroll through the garden or relax in the solarium. Iconic South Beach is 15 minutes’ walk away. Each apartment offers WiFi, a flat-screen TV, and a tablet computer. A small refrigerator and microwave are provided as well. A kitchen and dining area are featured in select apartments at 1818 Meridian House. An on-site launderette is available to all guests throughout their stay at this South Florida 1818 Meridian House. Bicycle use is free based on availability. Miami International Airport is 10 miles away. These apartments are opposite Miami Beach Convention Center and 9 minutes’ walk from upscale shopping at Lincoln Road Mall.

name: The Sagamore Hotel South Beach
description: This modern hotel in Miami Beach offers complimentary Wi-Fi, as well as meeting rooms and an outdoor pool. It is conveniently located for those wanting to visit the area's popular attractions. This art deco hotel provides a range of amenities, including a concierge, luggage storage and a 24-hour reception. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to provide assistance. The Sagamore Hotel has 101 rooms, all of which are filled with a variety of amenities to ensure an enjoyable stay. The Sagamore Hotel provides a range of places to have a meal, including Canvas and Video Bar. A continental breakfast is served every day and room service is available for guests travelling at a more leisurely pace. A selection of eating options can also be found in close proximity to the property. The Sagamore Hotel is also moments from the area's popular establishments, plus Lincoln Road is a 10-minute stroll away. It is also within walking distance of Miami City Ballet, Miami Beach Convention Center and the Holocaust Memorial of the Greater Miami Jewish Federation.Revato

name: Global Luxury Suites at Monte Carlo
description: Located in Miami Beach, a 3-minute walk from Miami Beach and 1.7 miles from Surfside Beach, Global Luxury Suites at Monte Carlo has accommodations with free Wifi, air conditioning, a private beach area and a rooftop pool. Private parking is available on site. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. Some units feature a terrace and/or a balcony with sea or pool views. The apartment offers 4-star accommodations with a hot tub and fitness center. A bicycle rental service is available at Global Luxury Suites at Monte Carlo. New World Center is 4.6 miles from the accommodation, while Holocaust Memorial is 4.6 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 12 miles from Global Luxury Suites at Monte Carlo.

name: Stylish Wynwood Flats
description: No description found

name: President Villa
description: Featuring a rooftop terrace and a rooftop pool, President Villa is situated in Miami Beach and provides art deco accommodation. It offers 3-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. There are a variety of amenities available to those staying at the hotel, such as a 24-hour reception, valet parking and free Wi-Fi. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide local information. For the convenience of those staying at President Villa, rooms feature all the necessities, such as a private bathroom, a refrigerator and direct pool access. They provide a laptop safe, bottled water and a flat-screen TV. The hotel is ideally situated for exploring Miami Beach with the Wolfsonian-FIU within walking distance. It is also within walking distance of Lincoln Road, Lummus Park and Ocean Drive.Revato

name: Holiday Inn Express Doral Miami, An IHG Hotel
description: A brand new, fresh, contemporary hotel with spaces that enable guests to be productive, connect with friends, family, and colleagues, and wake up feeling refreshed. Individuals and families stay with us while traveling globally and locally for business and leisure. They seek high-quality, affordable, and reliable choices, and value real, human connection. Located in close proximity to Doral's vibrant shopping districts including, Miami International Mall, Dolphin Mall and CityPlace Doral, our guests have a variety of entertainment options such as, dining, comedy, bowling, movies, nightlife and upscale shopping.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Private Residences At Hotel Arya By Sofla Vacations
description: Located within the Sonesta Coconut Grove Hotel, the Private Residences at Sonesta by SoFLA Vacations offer a heated outdoor pool, hot tub, free WiFi, and free private on-site parking. Miami city center is 4.3 mi away. Every suite and apartment has a seating area and a dining table. Apartments have a full kitchen including an oven, stove, and dishwashwer. Ocean, skyline, and river views are available. Private Residences at Sonesta by SoFLA Vacations features a sauna, fully equipped fitness center, and 2 squash courts. A 24-hour front desk and room service are offered for convenience. Guests can enjoy a meal of continental and Peruvian specialties at either of the 2 on-site restaurants which overlook Coconut Grove and Sailboat Bay. CocoWalk with chic shopping venues is 3 minutes' away. Miami Beach is 8.1 mi from Private Residences at Sonesta by SoFLA Vacations, and the nearest airport, Miami Airport, is 5 mi from the property.

name: Churchill Suites Monte Carlo Miami Beach
description: Located in Miami Beach, these Florida apartments feature 2 outdoor heated pools and a fitness center. A full kitchen and free WiFi is provided in each apartment. Bayshore Golf Course is 3.6 mi away. A flat-screen cable TV, separate seating area, and hairdryer are provided. Some Churchill Suites Monte Carlo Miami Beach apartments have a balcony with an ocean or bay view. A hot tub is available to guests at this Miami Beach Churchill Suite Monte Carlo Miami Beach property. Valet parking is provided on site for an additional fee. The Miami Beach Convention Center is 3.9 mi away. The property is also 4 mi from the Jackie Gleason Theater of the Performing Arts and 30 minutes’ drive from the Miami International Airport.

name: Miami Sun Hotel - Downtown/Port of Miami
description: Only a few blocks from the beach and located close to motorway I-95, this Miami city center hotel provides guests with comfortable accommodations in a convenient location. All rooms are sanitized prior to check-in. The Miami Sun Hotel is located a short distance from the Bayside Marketplace, featuring restaurants, shops and entertainment, as well as the American Airlines Arena, home to basketball's Miami Heat. Guests at the Miami Sun can enjoy a fresh smoothie or a light meal at the on-site restaurant or take advantage of the hotel's laundry facilities.

name: Bikini Lodge
description: Located in Miami Beach (South Beach), Bikini Lodge is a 3-minute walk from Flamingo Park and 12 minutes by foot from Lincoln Road Mall. This hotel is 0.7 mi (1.2 km) from Colony Theater and 0.9 mi (1.5 km) from Lummus Park Beach. Make yourself at home in one of the 20 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Flat-screen televisions are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include microwaves and dryers, and you can also request irons/ironing boards. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. Flamingo Park - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi 8th Street Designer District - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi Lincoln Road Mall - 1 km / 0.6 mi Colony Theater - 1 km / 0.6 mi Española Way - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi Miami Beach Marina - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi Art Deco Historic District - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi Collins Avenue Shopping Area - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi World Erotic Art Museum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi Ocean Drive - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi Espanola Way and Washington Avenue - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi Lummus Park Beach - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi Miami Beach Beaches - 1.5 km / 1 mi Art Deco Welcome Center - 1.5 km / 1 mi Colony Hotel - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi The nearest airports are: Miami Intl. Airport (MIA) - 16.8 km / 10.4 mi Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood Intl. Airport (FLL) - 45.3 km / 28.2 mi Miami, FL (MPB-Public Seaplane Base) - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi Miami, FL (OPF-Opa Locka Executive) - 33.5 km / 20.8 mi The preferred airport for Bikini Lodge is Miami Intl. Airport (MIA). Featured amenities include a computer station, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and limited parking is available onsite. Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as concierge services. Additional features at this hotel include gift shops/newsstands and a television in a common area. You can enjoy a meal at Bikini Cafe & Beer Garden serving the guests of Bikini Lodge, or stop in at the grocery/convenience store. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM. You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: Deposit: USD 20 per accommodation, per stay A damage deposit of USD 20 will be collected before check-in. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Late check-out fee: USD 20 (subject to availability) Credit card charges are subject to a surcharge The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Only registered guests are allowed in the guestrooms. A car is not required for transportation to and from this property. This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place. The property is cleaned and disinfected using an electrostatic sprayer; disinfectant is used to clean the property; commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays; bed sheets and towels are laundered at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F. Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; a shield is in place between staff and guests in main contact areas; guests are provided with hand sanitizer; cashless payment methods are available for all transactions; contactless room service is available; masks are required in public areas. Enhanced food service safety measures are in place. This property affirms that it adheres to the cleaning and disinfection practices of COVID-19 Guidelines (CDC).Sembo

name: Abae Hotel
description: Offering a year-round rooftop pool and a sun terrace, ABAE Hotel by Eskape Collection is set in the South Beach district in Miami Beach, within a 15-minute walk of the beach. Lincoln Road is 0.6 mi from the property. Guest accommodations feature a 50-inch flat-screen TV, an iPad, and free WiFi. A dining area, complete with a microwave, dishwasher, and refrigerator is included. Kitchenware is provided. For guests convenience, a washing machine and dryer are provided in every suite. Private parking is available on site. Art Deco Historic District is 0.7 mi from ABAE Hotel by Eskape Collection. Miami International Airport is 12 mi away.

name: Oceanfront Studio Miami Beach
description: Located in Miami Beach, this welcoming apartment lets you experience it all. Thanks to the convenient nearby parking, you can either leave your vehicle behind and enjoy a short 5-minute walk to Miami Beach Beaches, or easily tackle the quick 5-minute drive to Fontainebleau. This vacation rental features air conditioning and concierge services. Connect to the free WiFi, or get cozy in front of the TV. Prepare a home-cooked meal in the kitchen, complete with an oven and a stovetop, as well as a microwave, cookware, and paper towels. Other amenities include bed sheets and an ironing board.Expedia

name: Beach Haus Bal Harbour
address: 290 Bal Bay Drive, Bal Harbour, FL 33154
description: Located in Bal Harbor Village, Beach Haus find this secluded three-story building with views of the Intracoastal waterway, an outdoor pool and a 5-minute walk to Bal Harbor beach where you will find daily service with chairs and umbrellas. Spacious units fully equipped with a kitchenette or kitchen create the perfect set-up for a retreat where you can relax while you get immersed in the luxury of Bal Harbor living. Experience chic shopping and a selection of dining options less than a mile away at Bal Harbor Shops. Visit Halouver or Oleta River parks to ride a bike, a kayak, or a boat.

name: East Miami
description: Strategically located in the centre of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Miami. It also offers free Wi-Fi, a coffee bar and an express check-in and check-out feature. East Miami features an around the clock reception, as well as a concierge and meeting rooms. For added convenience, it offers luggage storage, a safe and room service. The hotel also has its very own gym, BEAST. The rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a private bathroom, a mini bar and a private balcony. They all feature ironing facilities, a flat-screen TV and an in-room safe. Quinto La Huella, the in-house restaurant, serves lunch and dinner and offers South American meals. Lunch are served daily at Domain. Guests can also enjoy a drink at Sugar. Miami's attractions, such as Icon Brickell, 701 Brickell Avenue and Plaza on Brickell, are within a 10-minute walk of East Miami. There are also a variety of popular restaurants serving local and international cuisine in the surrounding area.Revato

name: The Elser Hotel Miami
description: Located in Miami, a 6-minute walk from American Airlines Arena, The Elser Hotel Miami provides accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness center and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The property is a 3-minute walk from Bayside Market Place, and within 500 yards of the city center. At the hotel each room is equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The Elser Hotel Miami has certain rooms with city views, and rooms contain a balcony. At the accommodation every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. At The Elser Hotel Miami you'll find a restaurant serving American, Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. At the hotel guests are welcome to use a hot tub. Guests at The Elser Hotel Miami will be able to enjoy activities in and around Miami, like cycling. The accommodation provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near The Elser Hotel Miami include Bayfront Park, Bayfront Park Station and Adrienne Arsht Center for the Performing Arts. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 6.8 miles from the hotel.

name: 6080 Design Hotel by Eskape Collection
description: Located in Miami Beach, a 4-minute walk from Miami Beach, 6080 Design Hotel by Eskape Collection provides accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness center and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and an ATM. The property has a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a dishwasher, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At 6080 Design Hotel by Eskape Collection each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. New World Center is 4.1 miles from the accommodation, while Holocaust Memorial is 4.1 miles away. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 12 miles from 6080 Design Hotel by Eskape Collection.

name: Villa Italia South Beach
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free Internet and a high-definition TV, as well as an espresso maker and a minibar. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, designer toiletries, premium bedding, and a pillowtop bed.Expedia

name: Sonder 17west
description: Located within 1.1 miles of Miami Beach and 1.2 miles of Lummus Park Beach in Miami Beach, Sonder 17WEST has accommodations with a flat-screen TV. Complimentary Wifi is offered and private parking is available on site. Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, private bathroom and a kitchen including a dishwasher, oven, microwave and a toaster. Some units have a terrace and/or balcony. Popular points of interest near the condo hotel include LIK Fine Art Miami, Lincoln Road and New World Center. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 12 miles from Sonder 17WEST.

name: Spectacular Views in Bayfront Coconut Grove
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and a Smart TV, as well as an espresso maker and a minibar. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, down comforters, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Beach Apartment at Condo-hotel
address: 19370 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: Beach Apartment at Condo-hotel features lake views, free WiFi and free private parking, located in Sunny Isles Beach, a 4-minute walk from Sunny Isles Beach. All units comprise a seating area with a sofa, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen with various cooking facilities, including a dishwasher, a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. A balcony with pool views is offered in each unit. Golden Beach is a 5-minute walk from the condo hotel, while South City Beach Park is 1.4 miles away. The nearest airport is Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport, 8 miles from Beach Apartment at Condo-hotel.

name: Atelier Lumi at Lumicollection
description: Beautiful illuminated LOFT in the heart of Miami’s Design District, Wynwood and Midtown. Miami's hottest location, with the best restaurants and bars in South Florida. Minutes away from Miami Beach! Follow us @atelierlumi on insta * Important note: the house next door is also a rental property. The backyard is a shared space. Please be mindful of the space and the noise. Quiet hours starts at 10:30 PM. * Absolutely no more than 2 guest. Reservation will be terminated. The space Our loft is an architectural gem, an open airy house filled with light. An open kitchen that integrates with the common areas, perfect for entertaining or casual dinners. The loft coupled with a gorgeous backyard will be the perfect setting for a couple or party of 3, to relax and enjoy the beautiful Miami weather. Guest access All areas of the loft are accessible to our guests. Feel free to enjoy our premises as long as you are mindful of the well being of the property! Please be conscious of the space. Be extra careful going up and down the stairs and hanging out on the floor upstairs Relax sit back and enjoy your stay! Please be conscious of the space. Be extra careful going up and down the stairs and hanging out on the floor upstairs. We are available by phone, email or text if something ever comes up. Also, we live literally 5 minutes away from the property so if you ever need us we will be there right away!Expedia

name: South Beach Rooms and Hostel
description: This cosy hostel is in Miami Beach. The property consists of 28 rooms. Internet connection is provided for those needing to keep connected both in public and private spaces. Unfortunately, the front desk is not open 24 hours. This hostel does not offer cots on demand. No pets are allowed on the premises.HotelUrbano

name: Hotel Aka Brickell
description: The following services and amenities are available, but with reduced service: Fitness Center, Breakfast, On-site Restaurant(s), Pool, Room Service, Valet Parking.The following services and amenities are currently not available: Business Center, Concierge, Spa.Decidedly modern, boldly conceived, and beautifully designed, this luxury hotel creates a unique sensory experience for its guests. The 203 guest rooms and 103 residence suites were stylishly created with a sophisticated traveler in mind, combining some of the finest services with high-tech facilities. Located in a concave building of glittering glass and steel, AKA Hotel Brickell features a minimalist and contemporary design, in the of heart Miami's business district. Our Brickell Avenue address provides guests with easy access to many area attractions, including South Beach, Coconut Grove and Key Biscayne, and is just 15 minutes from Miami International Airport. Overlooking the sparkling Biscayne Bay and within walking distance to a myriad of shopping and dining destinations, you couldn't be better placed. As perfectly formed as the Miami skyline, this sleek downtown luxury hotel offers an array of room options, including guest rooms, studios, and one and two bedroom residence suites. Capturing a sense of understated elegance, and accessorized with complementary elements of glass, wood, leather and metal, AKA Hotel Brickell welcomes you to experience the city's innate sense of style and flair. Experience a symphony of International flavors and style at Level 25 - Miami's only restaurant and lounge, 25 stories in the sky. Discover how world-class vintages of The Wine Attic pair perfectly with Atrio's progressive, global fare. After, whet your palate with a creative cocktail at The Bar, while sharing savory Spanish pintxos, perfectly executed with an innovative twist. Elevate your nose for wine with a fine selection of wines by the glass and personalized attention of our on-staff sommelier.FarePortal

name: Ocean Front Casablanca Studios With Full Kitchens & Beach Access By Bl Rentals
description: Ocean Front Resort Apartments offers self-catering accommodations with free WiFi in Miami Beach. Miami city center is 7.5 mi away. The accommodations features a cable TV. There is also a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven, stovetop, microwave, and coffee machine. Private parking is also available on site. Bed linens and towels are provided. Ocean Front Resort Apartments also includes an outdoor pool. Luggage storage is available for a small fee. The onsite Gallura restaurant offers Sicilian cuisine and a full breakfast buffet. Fort Lauderdale is 19 mi from Ocean Front Resort Apartments. The nearest airport is Miami Airport, 11 mi from the property. Guests must register with the hotel upon arrival. The registration fee $45, which is not included and must be paid upon arrival. Registration desk is not responsible for the reservation, please contact the assigned agent for any requests. All units are located at the Casablanca Hotel but are independently owned and operated. Please note there is a departure cleaning and daily maid services are not offered. Additional cleanings or towels and linen exchange may be requested 1 day in advance for an additional fee. Please note that pets under 9 kilograms are permitted. Additional fees may apply. Contact the property for details. Please note that room decor and style may vary from room selected. Exact room decor and style cannot be guaranteed. Please note that parking is subject to availability. Please note that the property is currently undergoing renovations from 09:00 to 17:00. Restaurant is under renovation.

name: Novotel Miami Brickell
description: Discover a tranquil retreat two blocks from the heart of the Financial District at Novotel Miami Brickell, one of the best hotels in Brickell Miami. Featuring a lobby design inspired by the city's beachfront culture and colors, our contemporary Downtown Miami hotel is adjacent to Simpson Park, a preserved swath of hardwood forest. Sweeping views of the tree canopy, framed by skyscrapers and sparkling Biscayne Bay, give our rooftop pool and bar the feel of a tropical resort.accorhotels.com

name: Blue House
address: 7533 Bounty Ave, North Bay Village, FL 33141
description: This property is a 20-minute walk from the beach. Blue House is located in Miami Beach, 3.7 miles from Holocaust Memorial, and has a garden, a terrace and a bar. The property is around 3.7 miles from Miami Beach Convention Center and 4 miles from Lincoln Road. The property is 5 miles from Art Deco Historic District and 5 miles from Ocean Drive. All rooms features air conditioning, a microwave, a toaster, a coffee machine, a bath, free toiletries and a desk. Each room includes a private bathroom, while selected rooms also feature a balcony and others also feature a garden view. At the guesthouse, rooms contain a seating area. A continental breakfast is served at the property. Jackie Gleason Theater of the Performing Arts is 3.9 miles from Blue House, while Versace Mansion is 5 miles from the property. Miami International Airport is 9 miles away. Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 9.1 for a two-person trip. This property is also rated for the best value in Miami Beach! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in this city. We speak your language! Your stay will include: Sun Deck TerraceExpedia

name: 2 Bedroom Ocean Drive Newly Renovated
description: 2 Bedroom Ocean Drive Newly Renovated is located in the South Beach district of Miami Beach, a 2-minute walk from Lummus Park Beach and 500 yards from South Pointe Park Beach. Free Wifi is featuredthroughout the property. Each unit comes with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, washing machine and coffee machine, as well as a kitchen. Popular points of interest near the condo hotel include Miami Beach, Fisher Island Beach and Art Deco Historic District. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 11 miles from 2 Bedroom Ocean Drive Newly Renovated.
